ygData.subject: Re: Teleporting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... (snip) Just wanted to throw my 2 coppers on this thread. I hang out with mostly all evil races.  Mostly ogre/troll/ DE, with a few renegade humans and
ygData.messageBody:
> On a humorous side note, I had just feigned after a bad pull in Cazic,
> when the screen went to the Loading please wait... I was stumped,
> because I didn't see me die, until I looked up and saw the druid say
> that he was evac'ing. At first I was overjoyed at his timely salvation,
> until I remembered what hangs around druid circles.
>
(snip)

Just wanted to throw my 2 coppers on this thread.

I hang out with mostly all evil races. Mostly ogre/troll/ DE, with a few
renegade humans and halflings.And , teleportation is the only way to travel
my friend. Much better than that damn boat. Use your gather/shadows and
invis spells, and Teleport. Hell, around level 17 or so I can remember all
of us "pitching in" and making deals with the high level druids of n ro
tunnel, for a teleport to faydark. The shouting it in unrest, to get us
back home.

Morgul the Black
